languageKey.label: Fluid Displays
Data Consumers relying on the Fluid templating engine for rendering
Hide
This field is not actively used inside Tesseract.
This field is not considered by the existing components of Tesseract. It could be used to give a visual indication of an obsolete query. May be used actively in the future or remove altogether.
Title
Some significant name or label for the template.
Description
Purely descriptive field. Can be used for entering any necessary information about the template.
Template file
Relative path to the Fluid template file.
Use a path relative to the site root, poiting to an authorised folder (likely "fileadmin"). "EXT:"-like syntax is allowed.

The directory name to the selected file will be used to search for Fluid partials.
Thus if the path to the file is "fileadmin/templates/fluiddisplay/foo.html", partials should be placed in "fileadmin/templates/fluiddisplay/Partials/". See the structure inside the "Samples" folder of extensions "fluiddisplay".
